sourcesContent:
/**
 * GUMLET CONFIGURATION
 * ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────
 * Replace the value below with YOUR Gumlet subdomain URL.
 *
 * How to find it:
 *   1. Log in to https://dashboard.gumlet.com
 *   2. Go to Image Sources → your source
 *   3. Copy the "Gumlet URL" — it looks like:
 *      https://yourname.gumlet.io
 *
 * Example:
 *   export const GUMLET_BASE_URL = 'https://ahlproductions.gumlet.io';
 * ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────
 */
export const GUMLET_BASE_URL = 'https://YOUR-SUBDOMAIN.gumlet.io';

/**
 * DEFAULT IMAGE SETTINGS
 * These are applied globally unless overridden per-image.
 */
export const GUMLET_DEFAULTS = {
  quality: 80,
  format: 'auto',   // Gumlet auto-selects WebP/AVIF based on browser support
  fit: 'cover',
};
